topics.body: I just wrote a document to ask for a place in a scholarship program that sends students to 4 different countries. The reason why I wrote this is because I didn't receive an email that was suppose to tell me whether I failed or succeed, thus leaving me in the dark. They were suppose to do so but since I didn't get it, I missed my opportunity and got one less chance to continue my studies.
